name: mapillary-js
description: WebGL JavaScript library for displaying street level imagery from mapillary.com

scripts.build-css: cat styles/*.css | postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 versions, safari 7, ie 11' --use cssnano -o dist/mapillary.min.css
scripts.build-dev: browserify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary --debug | exorcist dist/mapillary.js.map > dist/mapillary.js
scripts.build-watch: watchify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary --debug -v -o 'exorcist dist/mapillary.js.map > dist/mapillary.js'
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --mode file --target ES5 --module commonjs --theme default --excludeExternals --name MapillaryJS --out docs/
scripts.build-min: browserify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/mapillary.min.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-typings
scripts.clean-typings: rm -rf typings/modules && rm -rf typings/globals && rm -f typings/index.d.ts
scripts.lint: npm run lint-spec && npm run lint-src
scripts.lint-src: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.ts src/**/**/**/*.ts
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint-src && typings install && npm run build-min && npm run build-dev && npm run build-css && npm run copy-assets
